description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: AniDock is a desktop software for Windows that allows users to index and organize information about anime publicly available on the internet. The software stores only metadata (titles, synopses, covers) locally on the user's computer.
description.note: AniDock DOES NOT host, store, distribute or transmit any video content. The software only organizes links and information from third-party websites that the user chooses to index.
